item.title: About
item.description:
Who am I
Gabriel CÄƒlin Penguin herder and, overall, a nice chap. Sure, this is empty now, but I’ll make time to add some info about me sooner or later…

item.title: First Blood!
item.description:
The very first post.
This site is statically generated with Hugo and hosted on GitHub pages. My intention is to write various work related stuff now and then. Mostly to try and keep track of my ongoing projects, my technological interests and my thoughts. Nothing fancy. Enjoy the ride!
